methods.name: createPath
methods.description: Creates a clipping path from the outlines of the actual text items (such as letters or words).

methods.name: convertToShape
methods.description: Converts the text object and its containing layer to a fill layer with the text changed to a clipping path.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The object's container.

properties.name: typename
properties.description: The class name of the object.

properties.name: antiAliasMethod
properties.description: The method of anti-aliasing to use.

properties.name: autoKerning
properties.description: Options for auto kerning.

properties.name: color
properties.description: The text color.

properties.name: useAutoLeading
properties.description: If true, uses the font's built-in leading information.

properties.name: tracking
properties.description: The amount of uniform spacing between multiple characters. Range: -1000 to 10000.

properties.name: verticalScale
properties.description: Character scaling (vertical) in proportion to horizontal scale. Range: 0 - 1000 as a percentage.

properties.name: horizontalScale
properties.description: Character scaling (horizontal) in proportion to horizontal scale. Range: 0 - 1000 as a percentage.

properties.name: baselineShift
properties.description: The amount of baseline offset of text.

properties.name: contents
properties.description: The actual text in the layer.

properties.name: font
properties.description: The text face of the character.

properties.name: leading
properties.description: The leading amount.

properties.name: ligatures
properties.description: If true, ligatures are used.

properties.name: alternateLigatures
properties.description: If true, alternate ligatures are used.

properties.name: oldStyle
properties.description: If true, old style is used.

properties.name: position
properties.description: The position of the origin for the text. The array must contain two values. Setting this property is basically equivalent to clicking the text tool at a point in the document to create the point of origin for text.

properties.name: direction
properties.description: The text orientation.

properties.name: size
properties.description: The font size in points.

properties.name: fauxBold
properties.description: If true, faux bold is used.

properties.name: fauxItalic
properties.description: If true, faux italic is used.

properties.name: capitalization
properties.description: The case of the text.

properties.name: strikeThru
properties.description: The strike through option to use.

properties.name: underline
properties.description: Options for underlining the text.

properties.name: language
properties.description: The language.

properties.name: noBreak
properties.description: If true, words are not allowed to break at the end of a line. When enacted on large amounts of consecutive characters, can prevent word wrap and thus may prevent some text from appearing on the screen.

properties.name: kind
properties.description: The type of text.

properties.name: justification
properties.description: The paragraph justification.

properties.name: leftIndent
properties.description: The amount to indent text from the left. Range: -1296 to 1296.

properties.name: firstLineIndent
properties.description: The amount to indent the first line of paragraphs. Range: -1296 to 1296.

properties.name: rightIndent
properties.description: The amount to indent text from the right. Range: -1296 to 1296.

properties.name: spaceBefore
properties.description: The amount of space before each paragraph. Range: -1296 to 1296.

properties.name: spaceAfter
properties.description: The amount of space after each paragraph. Range: -1296 to 1296.

properties.name: hangingPuntuation
properties.description: If true, uses Roman hanging punctuation.

properties.name: textComposer
properties.description: The text composing engine to use.

properties.name: hyphenation
properties.description: If true, hyphenation is used.

properties.name: minimumGlyphScaling
properties.description: The minimum amount (as a percentage) to scale the horizontal size of the text letters. Range: 50 - 200; at 100, the width of characters is not scaled. Valid only for justified text.

properties.name: desiredGlyphScaling
properties.description: The desired amount (as a percentage) to scale the horizontal size of the text letters. Range: 50 - 200; at 100, the width of characters is not scaled. Valid only for justified text.

properties.name: maximumGlyphScaling
properties.description: The maximum amount (as a percentage) to scale the horizontal size of the text letters. Range: 50 - 200; at 100, the width of characters is not scaled. Valid only for justified text.

properties.name: minimumLetterScaling
properties.description: The minimum amount of space (as a percentage) between letters. Range: 100 to 500; at 0, no space is added between letters. Valid only for justified text.

properties.name: desiredLetterScaling
properties.description: The amount of space (as a percentage) between letters. Range: 100 - 500; at 0, no space is added between letters. Valid only for justified text.

properties.name: maximumLetterScaling
properties.description: The maximum amount (as a percentage) of space between letters. Range: 100 - 500; at 0, no space is added between letters. Valid only for justified text.

properties.name: minimumWordScaling
properties.description: The minimum amount (as a percentage) of space between words. Range: 0 -1000; at 100, no additional space is added between words. Valid only for justified text.

properties.name: desiredWordScaling
properties.description: The amount (as a percentage) of space between words. Range: 0 -1000; at 100, no additional space is added between words. Valid only for justified text.

properties.name: maximumWordScaling
properties.description: The maximum amount (as a percentage) of space between words (0 -1000; at 100, no additional space is added between words). Valid only for justified text.

properties.name: autoLeadingAmount
properties.description: The percentage to use for auto leading. Range: 0.01 to 5000.00.

properties.name: hyphenateWordsLongerThan
properties.description: The minimum number of letters a word must have in order for hyphenation in word wrap to be allowed. Range: 2 to 25.

properties.name: hyphenateAfterFirst
properties.description: The number of letters after which hyphenation in word wrap is allowed. Range: 1 to 15.

properties.name: hyphenateBeforeLast
properties.description: The number of letters before which hyphenation in word wrap is allowed. Range: 1 to 15.

properties.name: hyphenLimit
properties.description: The maximum number of consecutive lines that can end with a hyphenated word.

properties.name: hyphenationZone
properties.description: The distance at the end of a line that will cause a word to break in unjustified type. Range: 0 - 720 picas.

properties.name: hyphenateCapitalWords
properties.description: If true, capitalized words can be hyphenated.

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width of the bounding box for paragraph text.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the bounding box for paragraph text.

properties.name: warpStyle
properties.description: The style of warp.

properties.name: warpDirection
properties.description: The warp direction.

properties.name: warpBend
properties.description: The warp bend percentage. Range: -100 to 100.

properties.name: warpHorizontalDistortion
properties.description: The warp horizontal distortion percentage. Range: -100 to 100.

properties.name: warpVerticalDistortion
properties.description: The warp vertical distortion percentage. Range: -100 to 100.

name: TextItem
description: The text object contained in an art layer.
